Hi <@U060JS28BNJ>. Just looking into this Beta. Is there a way to create a flow that includes workflow actions that belong to a public app?

Hi! Yes. All public app actions are considered `SINGLE_CONNECTION` actions. And you can use their `actionTypeId` in the new create workflows endpoint.

Probably easiest to set up an example workflow in a test portal that includes a public app action, use the new public API to view that workflow â€” you can use the same JSON from the `GET` and use it in the `POST`.
